forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 5pm. Cloudy, with a high near 29. Northeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow after 11pm. Cloudy, with a low around 21. Northwest wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Boston unfolds beneath a shroud of gray clouds, with a palpable chill in the air, the kind that wraps around your bones and prompts you to seek warmth. With temperatures hovering around 29 degrees, the gusts of northeast wind add an extra bite to the atmosphere, making the prospect of snow a tangible reality as the skies hint at the coming evening plumes. A slight chance of snow flurries lingers in the forecast until darkness descends, when the promise of accumulation becomes more certain as temperatures dip to a brisk 21 degrees. Indeed, the anticipation of winter's touch feels eminent, urging those who venture outside to don their warmest layers—heavy coats, mittens, and perhaps a knitted hat to stave off the chill that will accompany the snowy evening ahead.

As twilight deepens, a blanket of snow will grace the city, transforming the streets into a wintry tableau. It’s a night that draws you to the cozy comforts of home; however, for the adventurous, an evening walk may offer a chance to marvel at the soft, whispering flakes as they dance from the heavens. The world outside may appear frozen, yet the allure of a quiet neighborhood stroll, perhaps with a hot beverage in hand, beckons with its own unique charm. In these hours, let the practical coziness of woolen scarves and warm boots be your allies against the cold. Embrace the simplicity of the moment, and find joy in the tranquil beauty that a snowy evening brings forth.
